# sr-box



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The `<sr-box>` component is a primitive component.
It is a simple wrapper component that can create other components such as card.

## Properties

| Property          | Attribute         | Description                                                           | Type                                                                                                          | Default     |
| ----------------- | ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `as`              | `as`              | Specify wrapper HTML element                                          | `"article" \| "div" \| "section" \| "span"`                                                                   | `'div'`     |
| `backgroundColor` | `backgroundcolor` | Specify background fill inside box component                          | `"dark" \| "default" \| "primary" \| "secondary"`                                                             | `'default'` |
| `borderColor`     | `bordercolor`     | Specify border color                                                  | `"default" \| "primary"`                                                                                      | `'default'` |
| `borderRadius`    | `borderradius`    | Specify border radius                                                 | `"default" \| "none"`                                                                                         | `'default'` |
| `borderWidth`     | `borderwidth`     | Specify border width                                                  | `"thick" \| "thin"`                                                                                           | `'thick'`   |
| `boxShadow`       | `boxshadow`       | Control shadow effects around box component                           | `"level0" \| "level1" \| "level2" \| "level3" \| "level4"`                                                    | `undefined` |
| `color`           | `color`           | Specify text color inside box component                               | `"bright" \| "dark"`                                                                                          | `'dark'`    |
| `height`          | `height`          | Specify height of box component                                       | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                                                                              | `undefined` |
| `isBorder`        | `isborder`        | Enable or disable border around box component                         | `boolean`                                                                                                     | `false`     |
| `margin`          | `margin`          | Control amount of white space around the box component itself.        | `"spacer16" \| "spacer24" \| "spacer32" \| "spacer40" \| "spacer48" \| "spacer56" \| "spacer64" \| "spacer8"` | `'spacer8'` |
| `marginBottom`    | `marginbottom`    | Define amount of space at bottom side only.                           | `"spacer16" \| "spacer24" \| "spacer32" \| "spacer40" \| "spacer48" \| "spacer56" \| "spacer64" \| "spacer8"` | `undefined` |
| `marginLeft`      | `marginleft`      | Define amount of space at left side only.                             | `"spacer16" \| "spacer24" \| "spacer32" \| "spacer40" \| "spacer48" \| "spacer56" \| "spacer64" \| "spacer8"` | `undefined` |
| `marginRight`     | `marginright`     | Define amount of space at right side only.                            | `"spacer16" \| "spacer24" \| "spacer32" \| "spacer40" \| "spacer48" \| "spacer56" \| "spacer64" \| "spacer8"` | `undefined` |
| `marginTop`       | `margintop`       | Define amount of space at top side only.                              | `"spacer16" \| "spacer24" \| "spacer32" \| "spacer40" \| "spacer48" \| "spacer56" \| "spacer64" \| "spacer8"` | `undefined` |
| `padding`         | `padding`         | Control amount of white space around child components inside of a box | `"spacer16" \| "spacer24" \| "spacer32" \| "spacer40" \| "spacer48" \| "spacer56" \| "spacer64" \| "spacer8"` | `'spacer8'` |
| `paddingBottom`   | `paddingbottom`   | Define amount of white space at bottom side only                      | `"spacer16" \| "spacer24" \| "spacer32" \| "spacer40" \| "spacer48" \| "spacer56" \| "spacer64" \| "spacer8"` | `undefined` |
| `paddingLeft`     | `paddingleft`     | Define amount of white space at left side only                        | `"spacer16" \| "spacer24" \| "spacer32" \| "spacer40" \| "spacer48" \| "spacer56" \| "spacer64" \| "spacer8"` | `undefined` |
| `paddingRight`    | `paddingright`    | Define amount of white space at right side only                       | `"spacer16" \| "spacer24" \| "spacer32" \| "spacer40" \| "spacer48" \| "spacer56" \| "spacer64" \| "spacer8"` | `undefined` |
| `paddingTop`      | `paddingtop`      | Define amount of white space at top side only                         | `"spacer16" \| "spacer24" \| "spacer32" \| "spacer40" \| "spacer48" \| "spacer56" \| "spacer64" \| "spacer8"` | `undefined` |
| `width`           | `width`           | Specify width of box component                                        | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                                                                              | `undefined` |
